languages.text: "Сладость ваших губ, шерин, дурманит разум сильнее каликсийского вина в жаркий день. Но вы же не думали, что я отпущу вас вот так просто?" {n}Персиковый румянец играет на щеках контрабандистки, а глаза разгораются ярче обычного, когда Джай протягивает вам небольшой сверток.{/n} "Скромный дар в благодарность за проявленную заботу. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".

traits.locale_text: "Сладость ваших губ, шерин, дурманит разум сильнее каликсидского вина в жаркий день. Но вы же не думали, что я отпущу вас вот так просто?" {n}Персиковый румянец играет на щеках контрабандистки, а глаза разгораются ярче обычного, когда Джай протягивает вам небольшой сверток.{/n} "Скромный дар в благодарность за проявленную заботу. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "The sweetness of your lips, shereen, clouds the mind better than Calixian wine on a balmy day. But you did not think I would just let you go, did you?" {n}Jae's cheeks flush like a ripe peach and her eyes shine even brighter than usual as she hands you a small parcel.{/n} "A humble gift in return for all the trouble. May the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的，你的嘴唇是如此甜美。在风和日丽的日子里，它比卡利西斯的葡萄酒更加醉人。不过，你该不会以为，我就会这样放你走吧？”{n}婕伊的脸颊像成熟的桃子一样红润。她的双眼比平时更加闪亮，递给了你一个小包裹。{/n}“这是一件卑微的礼物，作为对这一切麻烦的补偿。愿至高无上的神皇始终指引你的道路。”
languages.original_text: "The sweetness of your lips, shereen, clouds the mind better than Calixian wine on a balmy day. But you did not think I would just let you go, did you?" {n}Jae's cheeks flush like a ripe peach and her eyes shine even brighter than usual as she hands you a small parcel.{/n} "A humble gift in return for all the trouble. May the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

languages.original_text: "The sweetness of your lips, shereen, clouds the mind better than Calixian wine on a balmy day. But you did not think I would just let you go, did you?" {n}Jae's cheeks flush like a ripe peach and her eyes shine even brighter than usual as she hands you a small parcel.{/n} "A humble gift in return for all the trouble. May the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

languages.text: «La dulzura de tus labios, shereen, nubla la mente mejor que el vino calixiano en un día de primavera. Pero no pensarás que voy a dejarte marchar sin más, ¿no?». {n}Las mejillas de Jae se vuelven del color del melocotón maduro y sus ojos relucen aún más de lo habitual mientras te entrega un pequeño paquete.{/n} «Un humilde regalo como compensación por tus problemas. Que el Exaltado siga vigilando los caminos que recorres».
languages.original_text: "The sweetness of your lips, shereen, clouds the mind better than Calixian wine on a balmy day. But you did not think I would just let you go, did you?" {n}Jae's cheeks flush like a ripe peach and her eyes shine even brighter than usual as she hands you a small parcel.{/n} "A humble gift in return for all the trouble. May the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: «La dulzura de tus labios, shereen, nubla la mente mejor que el vino calixiano en un día de primavera. Pero no pensarás que voy a dejarte marchar sin más, ¿no?». {n}Las mejillas de Jae se vuelven del color del melocotón maduro y sus ojos relucen aún más de lo habitual mientras te entrega un pequeño paquete.{/n} «Un humilde regalo como compensación por tus problemas. Que el Exaltado siga vigilando los caminos que recorres».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたの唇の甘さは、穏やかな日のカリキアのワインよりも心を曇らせるね、シャリーン。でも、あたしがあんたを手放すとは思わなかったでしょう？」{n}ジェイの頬は熟した桃のように紅潮し、目はいつも以上に輝きながら、小さな小包を手渡す。{/n}「ご迷惑をおかけしたお返しに、ささやかな贈り物さ。エグザルテッド・ワンが、アンタの進む道を見守り続けてくれますように、ってね」
languages.original_text: "The sweetness of your lips, shereen, clouds the mind better than Calixian wine on a balmy day. But you did not think I would just let you go, did you?" {n}Jae's cheeks flush like a ripe peach and her eyes shine even brighter than usual as she hands you a small parcel.{/n} "A humble gift in return for all the trouble. May the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたの唇の甘さは、穏やかな日のカリキアのワインよりも心を曇らせるね、シャリーン。でも、あたしがあんたを手放すとは思わなかったでしょう？」{n}ジェイの頬は熟した桃のように紅潮し、目はいつも以上に輝きながら、小さな小包を手渡す。{/n}「ご迷惑をおかけしたお返しに、ささやかな贈り物さ。エグザルテッド・ワンが、アンタの進む道を見守り続けてくれますように、ってね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Eure süßen Lippen, Shereen, trüben den Verstand besser als calixischer Wein an einem lauen Tag. Aber Ihr dachtet doch nicht, dass ich Euch einfach gehen lassen würde, oder?" {n}Jaes Wangen nehmen die Farbe eines reifen Pfirsichs an und ihre Augen glänzen noch mehr denn sonst, als sie dir ein kleines Paket überreicht.{/n} "Ein bescheidenes Geschenk als Dank für all Eure Mühe. Möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."
languages.original_text: "The sweetness of your lips, shereen, clouds the mind better than Calixian wine on a balmy day. But you did not think I would just let you go, did you?" {n}Jae's cheeks flush like a ripe peach and her eyes shine even brighter than usual as she hands you a small parcel.{/n} "A humble gift in return for all the trouble. May the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: "Eure süßen Lippen, Shereen, trüben den Verstand besser als calixischer Wein an einem lauen Tag. Aber Ihr dachtet doch nicht, dass ich Euch einfach gehen lassen würde, oder?" {n}Jaes Wangen nehmen die Farbe eines reifen Pfirsichs an und ihre Augen glänzen noch mehr denn sonst, als sie dir ein kleines Paket überreicht.{/n} "Ein bescheidenes Geschenk als Dank für all Eure Mühe. Möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « La douceur de vos lèvres monte à la tête plus agréablement que le vin de Calixis par une chaude journée. Mais vous ne pensiez pas que j'allais me contenter de ça, si ? » {n}Les joues de Jae rosissent comme une pêche mûre, et ses yeux brillent encore plus que d'habitude lorsqu'elle vous tend un petit paquet.{/n} « Je vous prie d'accepter ce modeste cadeau en guise de dédommagement pour tous les problèmes que j'ai occasionnés. Puisse l'Exalté continuer de veiller sur les chemins que vous emprunterez. »
languages.original_text: "The sweetness of your lips, shereen, clouds the mind better than Calixian wine on a balmy day. But you did not think I would just let you go, did you?" {n}Jae's cheeks flush like a ripe peach and her eyes shine even brighter than usual as she hands you a small parcel.{/n} "A humble gift in return for all the trouble. May the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: « La douceur de vos lèvres monte à la tête plus agréablement que le vin de Calixis par une chaude journée. Mais vous ne pensiez pas que j'allais me contenter de ça, si ? » {n}Les joues de Jae rosissent comme une pêche mûre, et ses yeux brillent encore plus que d'habitude lorsqu'elle vous tend un petit paquet.{/n} « Je vous prie d'accepter ce modeste cadeau en guise de dédommagement pour tous les problèmes que j'ai occasionnés. Puisse l'Exalté continuer de veiller sur les chemins que vous emprunterez. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim... Dudaklarının lezzeti, zihnimi ferah bir havada içilen Calixis şarabından daha güzel bulandırıyor. Seni bu kadarla bırakacağımı düşünmüyorsun umarım..." {n}Sana küçük bir paket uzatan Jae'ın yanakları olgun bir şeftali gibi kızarıyor, gözleri de normalden çok daha parlıyor.{/n} "Verdiğim zahmetlerin karşılığında mütevazı bir hediye. Görkemli, aştığın yollarda seni kollayıp gözlesin."
languages.original_text: "The sweetness of your lips, shereen, clouds the mind better than Calixian wine on a balmy day. But you did not think I would just let you go, did you?" {n}Jae's cheeks flush like a ripe peach and her eyes shine even brighter than usual as she hands you a small parcel.{/n} "A humble gift in return for all the trouble. May the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: "Ah şirinim, dudaklarının lezzeti, zihnimi ferah bir havada içilen Calaxian şarabından daha güzel bulandırıyor. Seni bu kadarla bırakacağımı düşünmedin ama umarım?" {n}Sana küçük bir paket uzatan Jae'ın yanakları olgun bir şeftali gibi kızarıyor ve gözleri her zamankinden bile daha fazla parlıyor.{/n} "Verdiğim zahmetlerin karşılığında mütevazı bir hediye. Görkemli aştığın yollarda seni kollayıp gözlesin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
